scripts.cleanImages: docker image rm io-manager-proxy io-manager-admin io-manager-server
scripts.cleanMinikubeCache: minikube cache delete io-manager-proxy && minikube cache delete io-manager-admin && minikube cache delete io-manager-server
scripts.set:mini:images: minikube image load io-manager-proxy io-manager-admin io-manager-server
scripts.build:images: concurrently "npm run build:proxy:image" "npm run build:admin:image" "npm run build:server:image"
scripts.setup:mini: npm run build:images && npm run set:mini:images && kubectl apply -f ./kubernetes-minikube
